name: CI
on : 
	push:
		branches:["main"]
env: 
	BUILD_TYPE:Release
jobs:
	build:
		runs-on: ubuntu-latest
		steps:
		- uses: action/checkout@v4
		- name: Configure CMake
			run: |
				mkdir build
				cd build
				cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${{eenv.BUILD_TYPE}} ..
				cmake --build .--config ${{env.BUILD_TYPE}}
				ctest -C ${{env.BUILD_TYPE}}
